section2.p:
Buddycloud channels build on XEP-0060's node affiliations.
XEP-0060 Affiliation Buddycloud Affiliation Description
Owner owner A moderator who can also remove and add other moderators.
(no similar role in XEP-0060) moderator Member who can post, manage follower affiliations, edit channel meta-data and retract posts.
Publisher follower+post Read-write channel member. Can also retract their own posts.
member follower read-only member
none none Entity can view posts and replies for open channels, but cannot publish new posts or replies.
outcast outcast An unwelcome member whose follow requests are silently ignored. No posting rights.
